Package org.tealeaf.javamarkdown

Class MarkdownBuilder

java.lang.Object
java.io.Writer
org.tealeaf.javamarkdown.MarkdownWriter
org.tealeaf.javamarkdown.MarkdownBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
@Deprecated public class MarkdownBuilder extends MarkdownWriter
Deprecated.
Refactored to MarkdownWriter. This class now extends MarkdownWriter to keep its functionality, but will inevitably be removed in favor for MarkdownWriter

A builder, or writer, that implements methods for appending markdown elements, as well as the ability to directly append markdown elements

Since:
0.0.7
